entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:10 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -20.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Schefferville Airport 01:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -20.5°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -23.3°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
